title: Who is Vasco Mutwa?
creator_credit: Alex Learmont, Alex Learmont Productions and Great Britain. Ministry of Information
brief_description: This film is used to balance any bias in “Last Grave at Dimbaza” and also to present the official South African view. It shows blacks as professionals, and stresses the cultural variations between African groups. About the Bantu nations of South Africa.
